MemoryInfobox.description: 'It was only a matter of time until the Cerberus brothers went after Markos to split him in two. In a preemptive strike, Markos asks you to distract them by burning their farm.'

General_Description: '''Farm in Flames''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Following [[Markos]]' direction, [[Kassandra]] set out to destroy the silos belong to the Cerberus brothers.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra returned to Markos at the vineyard.
*'''Markos:''' ''Ah, she's returned! Let me guess... the Cerberus wants to order another amphora's worth.''
<tabber>
|-| If players had refused to drink the wine=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''He wouldnt even drink it. He thought it was poisoned.''
*'''Markos:''' ''Nonsense! Who would think such a thing of Markos. Go to him, try again!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Not a chance. His bodyguards went after me. He was not happy.''
*'''Markos:''' ''Oh that's not a good thing.''
{{#tag:tabber|
If players fought and killed Cerberus. =
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Either way he's dead now.''
*'''Markos:''' ''Dead? That's just great. I guess there's only two left to deal with now.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Two?''
*'''Markos:''' ''The Cerebrus is three men. Why do you think they're called the Cerberus? Because they're three brothers—triplets!''
*'''Markos:''' ''What to do, what to do...? What am I saying? Kassandra, this is when we strike.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Strike? You and what army?''
*'''Markos:''' ''I have a demi-god for a best friend! That's an army as strong as twenty soldiers.''

*'''Kassandra:''' ''So what are you going to do?''
*'''Markos:''' ''They need to be spooked. As Mama says, a threat is like a bear—very scary! We'll burn the Cerberus' farm. Specifically, the silos.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's not a good idea.''
*'''Markos:''' ''When have you had reason not to trust me? Don't answer that, my friend. Just trust me!''
(Accept – I'll burn their farm.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It better work... Though I'm skeptical.''
*'''Markos:''' ''It's even worth sacrificing them as potential customers.''
(If players choose "What does the farm grow?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Do you want the crops burned, too?''
*'''Markos:''' ''They grow herbs—harmless plants for medicine. It's just the silos that should go. Blow them up!''
(If players choose "Who are the Cerberus brothers?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You couldn't have mentioned there were three of them before?''
*'''Markos:''' ''I thought it was implied. Having triplets runs in their family.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's a lot of cerberuses.''
*'''Markos:''' ''Let's hope they don't procreate and have Cerberus puppies.''
(Leave – I'll go now.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll pay their farm a visit.''
*'''Markos:''' ''Give them a good scare. I'm pretty sure it's the farm in Astypalia City... Their goons are always hanging around.''
<tabber>
|-| If the silos weren't already burned down=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Got it.''
Kassandra approached the farm near [[Astypalia City]]. Spotting a silo, she set it on fire
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's one silo down.''
As Kassandra approached another silo, she overheard a farmer.
*'''Farmer:''' ''What the fuck? My silos! Stop!''
Kassandra burned down another silo.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''One more silo to go.''
Kassandra approached another silo and similarly burned it down.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Done. I'll tell Markos it made quite the impression.''

|-| If the silos were already burned down=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The farm in Astypalia City? I burned those silos, and I didn't see any Cerberus there.''
*'''Markos:''' '' What? Their soldiers are always hanging around...''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm sure. There were only scared farmers.''
*'''Markos:''' ''No dogs and no Cerberus... Maybe it's not their farm after all. We sure dodged that arrow.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It won't stop the Cereberus from coming for you.''
(Transitions into [[Markos's Fate]])
</tabber>
